title: Hero MotoCorp records highest quarterly revenue, PAT, riding on better sales in 125 cc segment
description: Hero MotoCorp achieved record-breaking quarterly revenue and profit in Q1 FY25, with a 16 per cent revenue growth to Rs 10,144 crore and PAT at 1,123 crore, up 36 per cent from the previous year. The company sold 15.35 lakh units, up 13.45 per cent. CEO Niranjan Gupta credited the growth to increased sales in the 125 cc segment.  70 per cent of demand came from the 100/110 cc segments. The company plans to expand its EV brand Vida and anticipates better sales in the upcoming festive season.
